title: Championship Jewels Token - Day 3... but it's Day 2...
body: Um.... so... I'm pretty confused... like... Did Day 2 Token just get skipped?

replies.body: its really stupid just as day 1 ends i go to get day 1 jewel and its day 2.
GOSH DARN IT! thanks for the replies guys!
it was in store for me for a while, must be day 3 for them
Its past midnight, so technically it is day 3.
